duties_responsibilities.duty: Provides specific patient care duties and performs unit support activities in the operating room suite.
Updates surgeon preference card per entity specific processes and complies with all count policies and procedures.
Accountable that instrument trays match the instrument list provided in tray and escalates when incomplete.
Adheres to National Patient Safety Goals and demonstrates knowledge of procedures by anticipating needs prior and during each case.
Assists in achieving department expense per unit of service through judicious use of supplies.
Works additional or different shifts as requested, and assists with new employee orientation and training of students.
Utilizes down time effectively including, assisting other staff, restocking of rooms, and instrument processing.

education_certification.credential: AHA Basic Life Support for Healthcare Professional (AHA BLS Healthcare) - American Heart Association -REQUIRED
Approved program for Operating Room Technicians or demonstrated technical skills through on the job training
